posts.content:
I have 2 Porsche style Fuchs for sale both in VGC shiny ones, 1 bought from Vw Heritage and can't remember where I bought the other from, different size tyres as I carried 2 Spares when I had my last bus, I have now bought a Porsche spare wheel that I hope fits in the wheel well behind bench seat so these are up for sale, I only want what I paid for them, pictures are on ssvc Facebook page, £200 . No centre caps as these were spares on my roof rack., collection or own courier from Andover Hants.

Ta

Ron
Hi Ron, do you know the width of the rim and offset please? Thanks, Jez

Hi guys
Right the offsets and details are,
Wheel 1 - 5x130', 5.5j, offset I think is 34 and appears to be MWS, Tyre is a 175/55/R15 Conti, as this was a spare for several years cracking is on the tyre wall so would get it changed, has had a puncture repair I vaguely remember.

Wheel 2- 5x130', 5.5j, offset is 45 and is an SSP Wheel from Heritage, Tyre is a 195/65/R15 Dunlop, again was a spare for several years and I would change the tyre.

Pictures are on the SSVC Facebook page, Both wheels are shiny and VGC, I CARRIED THEM AS SPARES AND BOTH WHEELS FITTED ON MY BUS WITH DISCS AND WILLWOOD CALIPERS .

Only selling as I have bought an Original Porsche steel wheel.

Ron
